changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id bigserial primary key, first_name varchar not null, last_name varchar not null, email varchar unique not null, keycloak_id varchar not null unique, invite int not null unique, created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE exercise ( id bigserial primary key, title varchar not null, description text not null, picture_url varchar, video_url varchar, owner bigint references users(id), created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE workout ( id bigserial primary key, title varchar not null, description text not null, difficulty int not null, owner_id bigint references users(id), created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE program ( id bigserial primary key, title varchar not null, description text, created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE coach_user ( id bigserial primary key, coach_id bigint references users(id), follower_id bigint references users(id), created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE workout_exercise ( id bigserial primary key, workout_id bigint references workout(id), exercise_id bigint references exercise(id), repeats int not null, sets int not null, order_number int not null, created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE program_user ( id bigserial primary key, program_id bigint references program(id), user_id bigint references users(id), last_order_number int not null, created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE program_workout ( id bigserial primary key, program_id bigint references program(id), workout_id bigint references workout(id), order_number int not null, created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )

changeSet.author: ilya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_workout_exercise ( id bigserial primary key, user_id bigint references users(id), workout_exercise_id bigint references workout_exercise(id), repeats int not null, created_at timestamp default current_timestamp, updated_at timestamp default current_timestamp )
